mdx.excerpt: Issue My case: <  and  ^  keys are swapped <  Key (right of SHIFT) ^  Key (left of 1) This is because macOS set the wrong keyboard type (ISO, ANSI, JIS, ..) even if the wizzard shows the right result. On QMK based keyboards: KC_NUBS ISO:   < > ANSI: Non-US  \  and  | KC_GRV ISO:  ^ ° ANSI:  ~ ´ macOS default settings But for me and a lot of others with external…

frontmatter.title: macOS - External Keyboard keys are swapped (solved)
frontmatter.subtitle: Sometimes macOS could be painful..
